name: Extreme Desert Commando 3D
description: Welcome  to the Extreme Desert Commando.In this game Terrorists are in desert houses, enter into desert storm and start shooting, accurate shoot all the terrorists with deadly gun .user sniper rifles or your special guns,Do it fast you have short time to do the Duty, be a hero and fight with enemies! This is the best Desert commando shooting games in 3d desert storm. You are a special force agent to kill enemies.
